item.title: About
item.description: This is a “hello world” example website for the blogdown package. The theme was forked from @jrutheiser/hugo-lithium-theme and modified by Yihui Xie.

item.title: What is The Linear Regression Relationship Between How The Canadian Voters Feel About Canada and Their Age
item.description: We use (R Core Team 2020) and R package (Wickham et al. 2019) to do the analysis. Code and data supporting this analysis is available at: “https://github.com/Lily-WangQian/STA304_PS1.git”. Abstract: “We investigated the data set of the Canadian Election Study online survey in 2019. The results showed us that Canadians who are older have a better impression of the native country, Canada. This is because older people tend to be more mature and know the meaning of their identity is important.
